description: Delete a lineup job schedule shift
permissions: Authorized via LineupJobScheduleShiftPolicy (delegated to lineup). User must be admin or permitted by LineupPolicy.destroy? (customer manager or manager laborer on a lineup job production plan).
side_effects: Deletes the lineup job schedule shift record.
validation_notes: Requires lineup job schedule shift ID argument and --confirm. Deletion is blocked when the shift is associated with non-cancelled shifts.
